appInfoPage.title: Yamler--CD Controller
appInfoPage.tableContentNotNull: If the checkbox is selected, the table cannot be blank.
appInfoPage.appNameHelpText: Please choose an easy-to-understand application name, which can also be used as a namespace name.
appInfoPage.containerRegistryText: Setting up the Container Registry that is planned to be used.
appInfoPage.crServerText: Please enter the URL of the CR server.
appInfoPage.keyVaultConnectionText: If using KeyVault, please describe the configured content.
appInfoPage.projectNameText: Please add each key that is actually set in KeyVault one by one.
appInfoPage.NetdataText: NetData is a tool for monitoring the K8S system. If selected, it will be installed on the K8S system.
appInfoPage.podNumText: Set the number of PODs to launch in the cluster, default is 3.
appInfoPage.cpuHelpText: Set the number of CPUs to allocate to the cluster.
appInfoPage.memoryHelpText: Set the memory to allocate to the cluster.
appInfoPage.manageLevelText: This is a configuration item for granting permissions in Azure Cloud. Set it if you want to grant appropriate permissions to the cluster.
appInfoPage.prefixText: The prefix behind the cluster's domain name, e.g., the 'pre' in https://www.sample.com/pre/.
appInfoPage.diskSetText: If using disks in the cluster, please add disk settings.
appInfoPage.keyVaultSetText: If you want to use keys set in KeyVault in the cluster, please add them here.
appInfoPage.configMapSetText: If you want to add constants for use in the image, please add them in the form of Key-Value.
appInfoPage.domainText: Please add domains associated with the cluster; multiple domains can be added.
